p: Whereas it has been made appea? to our Circuit Court now in session at the City of S Louis wihtin and for the County of S Louis that you the Jailor if S Louis County, <&> Pierre Chouteau Sr Bernard Pratte and Alexis Amelin, detain in your Custody certain persons of colour namely Catiche alias Catherine, Julia, Joseph unknown! Helen who have petitioned and attained leave from our said unknown! unknown! to sue certain? persons to establish their freedom. These are therefore to unknown! unknown! unknown! that the bodies of the said Catiche Julia Joseph and Helen by you detained under safe and secure unknown! unknown! together with the unknown! and cause of their being taken and detained by whatever names they may be called, you have before the Judge of our Circuit Court on of unknown! the 19th day of May instant at the Court house in the City of S Louis Then and there to do and recieve? in? unknown! our said Court shall consider in that behalf.
